WorkItem.Description: Please let me know can D3 draw 1000000 points in a second?
WorkItem.Summary: can D3 draw 1000000 points in a second?

Comments.Message:
No. By far no, mainly with default settings.
Set RenderOptions.EdgeMode for window containing D3 to remove antialiasing (a lot faster).
Althought anti-aliasing removed, I have really better performance with National Instrument "Measurement Studio" graphics (WinForms).

Eric
